thread.title: Museum Replicas to Launch Night Angel Costume and Prop Collection
thread.title_full: Museum Replicas to Launch Night Angel Costume and Prop Collection

title: Museum Replicas to Launch Night Angel Costume and Prop Collection
text: Museum Replicas to Launch Night Angel Costume and Prop Collection October 12, 2015 -- New line of replica costumes and weapons from Brent Weeks Night Angel trilogy available now CONYERS, GA - 12 Oct, 2015 - Night Angel fans who are looking to immerse themselves in this amazing world, or to bravely train to be a Wet Boy, can finally have a taste of glory. Museum Replicas (MRL) is excited to announce a new partnership with acclaimed fantasy adventure author Brent Weeks to create a line of collectible and wearable costume and prop replicas from the popular literary trilogy Night Angel. The first wave of the collection introduces some of the series most popular characters, and successive series will build on its expansive cast and include womens ensembles. The first wave of items in the Night Angel replica collection includes: Retribution Sword and Scabbard Set Kylars Assassin Dagger Night Angel Vambraces The replica collection is perfect for fans, collectors and reenactors. Each piece is made from genuine leather, hand forged high carbon steel and other quality materials to fully capture the look and feel of each character. Made using a blend of state-of-the-art processes and expert, traditional bladesmithing from Windlass Steelcrafts. The line can be purchased as individual pieces so fans can create their own unique personas. The first wave is available now directly from MRL and select retailers. For nore information, visit: www.museumreplicas.com About MRL Established in 1985, MRL has been at the forefront of design, manufacture and marketing of historically based costumes and weapons including many TV, movie and literary blockbusters. MRL has licenses with some of todays most popular television shows, books, movies, and video games. For more information visit www.museumreplicas.com About Brent Weeks: Brent Weeks was born and raised in Montana. He wrote on bar napkins and lesson plans before landing his dream job years and thousands of pages later. Brent lives in Oregon with his wife, Kristi, and their daughter. Brent is represented by the Donald Maass Literary Agency. Please contact Cameron McClure for foreign acquisitions and Donald Maass for domestic rights. Donald Maass Literary Agency 121 West 27th St, Suite 801New York, NY 10001
